question:
Mrs barrett,an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day next summer.

Write a letter to Mrs barrett. In your letter
•suggest how you could help her in her home 
•say why you would like to do this work
• explain when you will and will not be available.
text: Good morning,my name is Dumebi Ugwu and I'm writing to indicate my interest in working for you in your home next summer. Generally, I love housekeeping,cooking and doing the laundry as well. So ,I believe I could be of great assistance to you.
My school is currently in session but I'm hoping by the end of the session I'll be ready to work. This offer is what I need to get busy and earn, while I wait for college admissions.

However,I would like to indicate that I will not be available to work on Wednesday and Sunday because these days are when I get to take care of my sick mum in the hospital. In addition ,I will be available every other day.
Please let me know if you need any extra information about me. I very much look forward to hearing from you soon.
